blog.title: Our thinking
blog.subtitle: Our latest thoughts on current issues

join.title: Join our movement
join.description: Every step of our journey we’re uncovering more people in Leeds who are curious, serious or passionate about reducing their waste. If you’re one of those people, join us.

intro.title: Our projects
intro.subtitle: What we’re currently working on
intro.headline: Leeds School Uniform Exchange
intro.description: We're helping to make second-hand school uniform the first choice in Leeds.  Our Leeds School Uniform Exchange project is supporting people across the city to swap uniform at their school or in their local community.

get_involved.title: Get involved
get_involved.subtitle: Issues we’re currently looking into in Leeds

hire.title:
Need help? 
 Hire us!
hire.description:
Our expertise lies in developing behaviour change campaigns that help people and organisations to waste less.

Are you interested in us working with you? 

We have a strong track record for developing engaging, impactful campaigns that create change.  Our 10 week #stayathome waste reduction campaign - developed at the start of lockdown in March and delivered for Leeds City Council - is the latest example of this.  You can read our impact report [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19LPgf0gzOOzYTYmitXUZje8d2BwdeAXG/view).

link.text: Talk to us to find out more

supporters.title: Our supporters
supporters.description: We’re building a movement. That means everything we do is collaborative and in partnership with others. See who we’re partnering with and who’s helping to fund our work here.

tips.title: Our top tips
tips.subtitle: Ways to start reducing your waste

projects.title: Zero Waste Clothing
projects.description: Clothing accounts for around 10% of global CO2 emissions - so we're exploring what we can do to reduce the environmental impacts of the clothes we wear.

projects.title: Leeds By Example
projects.description: Leeds City Council has recently introduced new recycling bins for coffee cups, drinks cans and plastic bottles in six neighbourhoods in Leeds - and we're helping to get the word out.

ideas.title: Got an idea?
ideas.description: All the work we do begins with an idea. If there’s an issue in Leeds you think we should look into, tell us about it.
